title: Decentralized eLearning & DIDs
description: Digital education in Latin America has low efficiency, is costly, and is not able to reach a larger audience.
solution: A decentralized eLearning platform with socio-economic incentives for its participants, that provides legitimacy though the use of DIDs
experience: Plutus Pioneer, 20+years experience in software engineering, 15+years DEVOPS expertise, counselled by business and marketing advisors.
